translation.en: -[woman laughing] -[Jon] I don't know.
translation.de: EIN LEBEN OHNE COOKIES IST KEIN LEBEN Ich weiß nicht.

translation.en: -There we go. Chefs everywhere. -[woman] It says, "everything."
-Yeah. -Roy likes it.
[Roy] Like, you took my words too literally.
translation.de: Du hast das zu wörtlich genommen.

translation.en: I heard you were here before they even opened.
translation.de: -Du warst schon vorher hier. -Ich bin in der Gegend aufgewachsen.

translation.en: I grew up right here in this area. This store here--
translation.de: -Du warst schon vorher hier. -Ich bin in der Gegend aufgewachsen. Der Laden...

translation.en: -This was my Baskin-Robbins. Yeah. -This was his Baskin-Robbins.
-Bittersweet. -I have mixed feelings.
But no, this was my Baskin-Robbins, but I'm so happy she's here.
translation.de: Das war mein Baskin-Robbins, aber ich bin froh, dass sie hier ist.

translation.en: I've been involved with Christina for a long time.
I mean, her first book tour, we did at Chego.
translation.de: Ihre erste Buchlesung war im Chego.

translation.en: [Christina] You have this book. The publisher's like, "How are you gonna promote it?" [laughs]

translation.en: And you're like, "I have this one friend in LA.
translation.de: Und ich sagte: "Ich habe einen Freund in LA.

translation.en: -Maybe I can call him and see." -That's great.
So I'm like, "Roy." And he's like,
-"We'll do old-school bake-sale style." -Sale.
"I got a folding table. We'll put you out on the street."
translation.de: "Wir stellen einen Klapptisch auf die Straße."

translation.en: It's like, if you're gonna learn how to cook for a bake sale,
translation.de: Wenn man für einen Kuchenbasar backen lernen will,

translation.en: -who would you want as your secret weapon? -[Roy] Yeah.
-For you to get perspective-- -I grew up on bake sales.
-[Roy] I know, that's your whole-- -It is my tried-and-true.
I will pull over the side of the road
to go to a bake sale and spend $20 and get baked goods that run the gamut.
translation.de: um vom Kuchenbasar für 20 $ das ganze Spektrum an Backwaren zu kaufen.

translation.en: So we wanted to use this to, like-- Take back the bake sale.
Take back the bake sale, and also offer something.
translation.de: Ja. Und wir wollen was bieten nach dem Motto:

translation.en: You know what? Just pause, and then let's try to make a good cookie,
translation.de: "Mach doch mal Pause. Wir backen jetzt einen guten Cookie,

translation.en: make a good brownie.
-My favorite cookie… -[Jon] Uh-huh.
has been my favorite cookie at Milk Bar since the very beginning.
translation.de: ...war von Anfang an mein Lieblings-Cookie in der Milk Bar.

translation.en: It was the cornflake, chocolate chip, marshmallow cookie.
[Jon] It's really good.
Look at how much cornflake crunch goes into this cookie.
translation.de: So viele knusprige Cornflakes kommen rein.

translation.en: -Goes into this. Yes. -Yeah.
[Christina] This is caramelized cornflakes. It's cornflakes. There's some sugar, some salt, some milk powder.
translation.de: Karamellisierte Cornflakes. Cornflakes, Zucker, Salz, Milchpulver.

translation.en: You know, people are always really scared of salt in their baked goods.
translation.de: Die Leute haben immer Angst vor Salz in ihrem Gebäck.

translation.en: -You need salt and you need acid. -Yeah.
But making anything taste good requires that balance.
-This is cultured butter. -[Jon] That gives you acid, the culture?
It gives you a bit of acid, but the thing a lot of home cooks don't think about is
translation.de: Sie sorgt für etwas Säure, aber viele Hobbyköche denken nicht daran,

translation.en: that your baking powder and baking soda, which are what you use for leavener,
translation.de: dass Backpulver und Backnatron, die man als Treibmittel benutzt, für die Säure sorgen.

translation.en: that's where you get the acid.
translation.de: die man als Treibmittel benutzt, für die Säure sorgen.

translation.en: [Jon] I don't understand. Wait.
Baking powder and baking soda. Can you tell me the difference?
Okay, so baking powder is a leavener. It gives acid.
translation.de: Ok, Backpulver ist ein Treibmittel. Es sorgt für Säure.

translation.en: -[Jon] Okay. -It also helps with texture.
And baking powder is typically double-acting,
so it activates as a leavener when it hits heat the first time.
If it hits another acid, it will react again.
translation.de: ...und es reagiert wieder, wenn es auf mehr Säure trifft.

translation.en: -As a leavener? -[Christina] It'll lift again.
So what would you add to baking powder to make it lift?
translation.de: Was fügst du also hinzu, damit das Backpulver treibt?

translation.en: This is a good one! You know the science fair?
-And you build the volcano? -Yes, the volcano.
-Right. -Baking powder, vinegar.
-Vinegar in there because it's acid. -[whooshing] Yeah.
I gotcha. Mentos and Diet Coke.
-Same. Similar. -Same thing.
-You can feel it happening in here. -Yes.
[Christina] So we add the light brown sugar and granulated sugar.
translation.de: Wir fügen hellbraunen Zucker und Kristallzucker hinzu.

translation.en: The secret to any great chocolate chip cookie is the dark vanilla extract.
translation.de: Das Geheimnis für tolle Schokochip-Cookies ist der dunkle Vanilleextrakt.

translation.en: But you'll also use the white vanilla for other things.
translation.de: Du benutzt auch die weiße Vanille für andere Sachen.

translation.en: -Look at--I like that you came in ready. -[Jon] Yeah. Yeah.
-That creamy vanilla is birthday vibe. -[Jon] Yeah.
-It's the fake vanilla. Yeah, okay. -That's dreamy, fake vanilla,
which I would never use, baking these cookies.
translation.de: Würde ich nie für diese Cookies verwenden.

translation.en: But we cream this sucker in total for ten minutes, which is unheard of.
translation.de: Wir schlagen das hier zehn Minuten lang, was total unüblich ist.

translation.en: So in your style of baking, are you using metric? Are you using pounds?
translation.de: Benutzt du das metrische System oder Pfund?

translation.en: We're using metric. We use weight to the gram.
translation.de: Das metrische System. Wir wiegen aufs Gramm genau.

translation.en: -[Roy] Yeah. -If it's a small amount,
to the tenth of the 100th of a gram.
But most home-baking recipes are by cups and teaspoons.
translation.de: Die meisten Hobby-Backrezepte rechnen mit Tassen und Teelöffeln.

translation.en: -They are. -Is it part of the problem?
It's always part of the problem.
-With the bread, it's all… Like with-- -Yeah.
-Bread is all grams and weighed in metric. -Has to be weighed in metric.
translation.de: -Da muss es grammgenau sein. -Muss metrisch sein.

translation.en: [Christina] You don't need a crazy gem scale. You just need something.
translation.de: Man braucht keine Juwelierwaage. Was Einfaches reicht.

translation.en: If all three of us made a cup of flour,
translation.de: Eine Tasse Mehl wäre bei uns

translation.en: -it'd weigh different across the board. -That's right.
When we write our cookbooks, the publishers maybe hate me a little bit,
translation.de: Bei unseren Backbüchern hassen mich die Verlage vielleicht etwas,

translation.en: but I'm like, "No, we're gonna give it to them in grams
translation.de: aber ich sage immer: "Nein, wir nehmen Gramm.

translation.en: 'cause that's how we do it, and we're not going to be a part of the bad bake sales.
translation.de: Wir wollen nicht an schlechten Kuchenbasaren schuld sein."

translation.en: Yeah.
-All right, where did you put my egg? -[Roy] I got it here.
translation.de: Ok, wo ist mein Ei? Hier ist es.

translation.en: Amazing.
So we want it to aerate for sure
translation.de: Wir wollen, dass die Masse luftig wird,

translation.en: because the second you add that egg yolk, it forces the emulsification
translation.de: denn sobald man das Eigelb hinzugibt, -verbinden sich Butter und Zucker. -Ja.

translation.en: -of the butter and the sugar. -Yeah.
[Christina] It strengthens that bond. And we need this to be super strong
translation.de: So verbindet sich alles besser, und das brauchen wir,

translation.en: because you know when your cookies… Some of it bakes out lacy and flat
translation.de: denn wenn die Cookies... Oft werden sie löchrig und flach,

translation.en: -and you can see the butter baking out? -Yeah, yeah.
It's because you didn't take enough time here.
[Jon] Yeah.
Speaking of lacy cookies, there are good lacy cookies.
translation.de: Apropos löchrige Cookies: Es gibt gute Lace Cookies.

translation.en: -The chocolate chip ones that are-- -Oh, yeah.
-[Roy] That are crispy on the edges. -Oh, yeah.
How do you get that cookie versus just a regular chocolate chip cookie?

-and you want it to be purposefully lacy-- -Almost a palmiers texture, right?
translation.de: -...die löchrig sein sollen... -Eine Struktur wie Schweinsohren.

translation.en: [Christina] You're not playing this crazy whipping game.
translation.de: Man schlägt dann den Teig nicht so verrückt.

translation.en: It's not about giving it aeration. It's just about the ratio of flour to sugar to butter.
translation.de: Es geht nicht um Luftigkeit, sondern ums Verhältnis von Mehl, Zucker und Butter.

translation.en: And it'll naturally bake out.
-Yeah. Because the melted-- -What are those Pepperidge Farm ones
-that they dip in chocolate? -Yeah. Oh!
-Those are really good. -[Christina] Why can't I bake those?
The most ones you see at bakeries are the chocolate chip, but then it…
translation.de: Beim Bäcker gibt es meistens Schokochip.

translation.en: -I grew up on the iced oatmeal ones. -Yes.
-Remember those? -Yes. Those were so good.
I used to load Pepperidge Farm cookies onto trucks in Queens.
translation.de: Ich belud in Queens Lkws mit Pepperidge-Farm-Cookies.

translation.en: -Stop it. -[Jon] We were kids in school. The drivers would tip us.
translation.de: -Krass. -Die Fahrer gaben uns Kindern Geld dafür.

translation.en: -We'd wait by the distribution center. -That's a dream job.
And we would go pick out their boxes and load up their trucks.
translation.de: Und wir luden ihre Kisten auf die Lkws.

translation.en: -[Roy] And load it up. -Yeah. That was it.
-[Roy laughs] -[Christina] I love that.
[Christina] This is flour, salt, baking powder,
translation.de: Hier haben wir Mehl, Salz, Backpulver,

translation.en: -baking soda. -[Jon] Right.
We know we need to add this, so the secret to this mixing is
translation.de: Das muss auch noch rein, deshalb dürfen wir

translation.de: -diesen Teil hier nur ganz kurz rühren. -Ja.

translation.en: [Christina] That's it.
[Jon] Is that all you would mix right there?
-[Christina] I'll mix this other stuff in. -[Jon] Because you'll do that too.
translation.de: -Nein, das kommt ja noch rein. -Das kommt noch rein.

translation.en: -[Christina] These are sea salt bars. -What are the biggest flaws you see
in just everyday home-baking cookies? What I see is, it's either too chalky--
translation.de: bei selbst gebackenen Cookies? Entweder sind sie zu trocken

translation.en: -[Christina] Mm-hmm. Yes. -and hard as a rock.
No one creams their butter and their sugar long enough.
translation.de: Keiner rührt Butter und Zucker lang genug.

translation.en: -Yup. -Ever.
It's like two seconds, zoom, zoom, zoom, we're done. Yeah. They're probably doing the first phase that long.
translation.de: -Nach zwei Sekunden sind die Leute fertig. -Ja. Die erste Phase dauert wohl so lange,

translation.en: They're doing the second phase as long as we did the first phase--
translation.de: und die zweite so lange wie bei uns die erste.

translation.en: -They're doing this. -you gotta swap them.
They overmix it, which is why you get the chalky, hard cookie.
translation.de: -Durchs lange Rühren werden... -Ja. ...Cookies trocken und hart.

translation.en: -Once you add the flour-- -Like, the gluten forms?
-Yes. -You've taught him so well.
You're really getting…
I don't ever tell anyone this stuff because it feels very…
translation.de: Ich erkläre das sonst nie, denn das hört sich so...

translation.en: -Nerdy? -Well, no, I like being a nerd,
but the details of it are overbearing in the spirit of something
translation.de: aber die Details sind erdrückend, -obwohl das Ganze Spaß machen soll. -Nein, so ist das nicht. Es hilft.

translation.en: -that should be pure unadulterated joy. -No, you don't understand. It helps
translation.de: -obwohl das Ganze Spaß machen soll. -Nein, so ist das nicht. Es hilft.

translation.en: because once I understand the principles, I can apply it to other things.
translation.de: Wenn ich die Prinzipien verstehe, kann ich sie woanders anwenden.

translation.en: Yes. It is funny if you think about that. You go to culinary school
translation.de: Ja. Das ist das Interessante. In der Kochschule lernt man die Grundtechnik.

translation.en: because you have to learn the basic technique.
translation.de: In der Kochschule lernt man die Grundtechnik.

translation.en: -Yes. -But the instinct is something
that you pick up word-of-mouth -along the way. Trial and error. -Yeah.
You have to learn how other people do it to figure out what your palate wants.

translation.en: -Yes. -How someone seasons their cookie dough
is probably totally different than the way I do it.
-Yes. -But I also bake like I'm a cook
translation.de: -Ja. -Aber ich backe auch wie eine Köchin,

translation.en: You tasted, you went.
So all of this ridiculous mass goes in.

translation.en: That's so cool.
[Christina] Chocolate.
And then, for here, I'm pulsing like…
-[Jon] You're keeping it… -[Christina] That's it.
…as short as you can, yeah? As far as…
-[Roy] Wow, that was fast. -[Jon] Oh, wow.

Fill the whole scooper and then bottoms it off with the palm of your hand.

translation.en: -[Jon] Salmonella. -[Christina] Please stop.
These nice, little mountain tops are perfect
because the cookie is largely butter.

translation.en: And so the taller we can make them, the less flat they'll get.
translation.de: Je höher sie sind, desto weniger flach werden sie.

translation.en: -They keep their shape longer? -[Christina] Mm-hmm.
translation.de: Behalten sie so länger ihre Form?

translation.en: -[Jon] Do they cook well-- -And we added so much extra butter in.
translation.de: -Ist das gut... -Und wir haben so viel Butter drin.

translation.en: We wanna give that butter a fighting chance before the heat hits it.

translation.en: -[Christina] All right, we're coming in. -[Roy] Hello. Wow.
[Jon growls] Here we are.
-[Christina] And that's it. -[Roy] Let's go.
[Jon] And what's this?
[Christina] This is a super deepened graham pie shell.
translation.de: Das ist eine sehr tiefe Form mit Keksboden.

translation.en: As long as I can add butter, sugar, salt, a little bit of milk powder,
translation.de: Solange ich Butter, Zucker, Salz und etwas Milchpulver zugeben kann,

translation.en: -anything can be a crust. -[Jon] Wow.
So this was your first, kind of, attempt--
translation.de: Das war also dein erster Versuch...

translation.en: This is my first vehicle of dessert.
translation.de: Das war mein erstes erfolgreiches Dessert.

translation.en: …to define the bridge between who you were and who you're becoming?
translation.de: ...rauszufinden, wer du bist und wer du sein willst?

translation.en: Yeah. I was a crazy home baker before I moved to New York to go to culinary school and do all this stuff.
translation.de: Ja. Ich war begeisterte Hobbybäckerin, bevor ich in New York zur Kochschule ging.

translation.en: I never wanted to lose that piece of it
translation.de: Und diese Seite wollte ich nie aufgeben,

translation.en: because I knew there was something there that was true to me.
translation.de: weil ich wusste, das entspricht meinem Wesen.

translation.en: -The home-baker side? Yeah. -[Christina] The home-baker side.
When you're making a brownie at home, sometimes you swirl stuff in it.
translation.de: In Brownies mischt man manchmal einfach Zeug rein.

translation.en: Like, why can't you just put the batter of a brownie into a pie crust and bake it?
translation.de: -Warum nicht einfach den Brownie-Teig... -Ja. ...zum Pie-Teig geben und backen?

translation.en: Like, why not? The graham that's in the brownie batter will start to bridge
translation.de: Warum nicht? Die Graham-Cracker im Brownie-Teig beeinflussen,

translation.en: what will happen on your palate.
[Roy] Going back to bake sales, the most flaws I usually encounter are, they're chalky.
translation.de: Beim Kuchenbasar erlebe ich oft, dass der Kuchen trocken schmeckt.

translation.en: Where is that coming from for the--
-The chalkiness? It's bad chocolate. -[Roy] …average home baker?
Yes. Don't skimp on the ingredient, right? [Christina] Yes.
translation.de: -Ja. Bei Zutaten soll man nicht geizen. -Genau.

translation.en: There's really no substitution for really good chocolate,
translation.de: Es gibt keinen Ersatz für gute Schokolade

translation.en: really good cocoa powder. The darker, the deeper, the better.
translation.de: und gutes Kakaopulver. Je dunkler und herber, desto besser.

translation.en: You don't just go to the supermarket, buy the chips or the nibs and melt it?
translation.de: Du schmilzt nicht Schokostückchen aus dem Supermarkt?

translation.en: I do when I'm using chocolate chips because they're semi-sweet.
translation.de: Ich kaufe da Schokochips, weil sie halbsüß sind.

translation.en: Also the fancy chocolate people don't make mini chocolate chips.
translation.de: Edle Marken stellen keine Mini-Schokochips her. Stimmt.

translation.en: [Christina] So take that out of the bowl.
translation.de: Hol das aus der Schüssel raus.

translation.en: -[Jon] These guys? Okay. -[Christina] Yeah. Let me get spoons
translation.de: -Das hier? Ok. -Ja. Ich hole Löffel zum Probieren.

translation.en: so we can taste it.
[Jon] Dang.
[Jon] Wanna lick?
You always know who's on the chocolate station when you walk into the kitchen because they're always…
translation.de: Man weiß, wer mit der Schokolade arbeitet, wenn man in die Küche kommt, weil...

translation.en: -It's impossible. You're being covered-- -Me, it'd be my face covered with it.
[Christina] And this just goes straight into the pie crust.
translation.de: Das kommt direkt auf den Pie-Teig.

translation.en: -[Jon] And it'll settle on its own? -[Chrisitna] It'll settle on its own.
There's little graham compared to what you're doing with the cookie
because it's disappeared and been incorporated.
translation.de: Sie haben sich verbunden und sind weg.

translation.en: Yes. And it starts to break up a little bit, so it's almost like a graham-y brownie batter.

translation.en: [Jon] I can see what you're saying.
[Christina] One of my favorite things with chocolate
translation.de: Was ich bei Schokolade besonders mag,

translation.en: is to play off of the acidity with another acidity.
translation.de: ist das Zusammenspiel der Säure mit anderer Säure.

translation.en: And my favorite thing in that space is mint.
translation.de: Und dafür nehme ich am liebsten Minze.

translation.en: Mint has a zest, but it also has a bite to it.

translation.de: Also bereiten wir diese seltsam klebrige Mixtur zu.

translation.de: Das ist weiße Schokolade. Geht auch billig,

translation.de: Das ist weiße Schokolade. Geht auch billig, -denn weiße Schokolade ist immer gleich. -Feste Milch.

translation.de: -denn weiße Schokolade ist immer gleich. -Feste Milch.

Some oil.
-[Jon] What, grape seed? -[Christina] I like grape seed.
translation.de: Traubenkern? Ich mag Traubenkern. Wir nehmen geschmackloses, farbloses Öl.

translation.de: Ich mag Traubenkern. Wir nehmen geschmackloses, farbloses Öl.

We add confectioner's sugar. I'll let you pop that in.

translation.en: [Jon] Okay.
The secret to anything that you want to taste like a great mint
translation.de: Das Geheimnis für einen tollen Minzgeschmack

-Look how cool. -Oh, yeah.

translation.de: Das ist das Ergebnis davon, -dass ich mit 10, 11, 12 Jahren... -Ja!

…trying to figure out how to get the swirls just right.

a old-fashioned marshmallow.

translation.de: Ich glaube, jeder will angesprochen werden...

translation.en: on some level. Everyone's in search of connection.
And with food, the easiest way to speak to someone
translation.de: Und beim Essen spricht man andere am besten

-That's it. We put it on a sheet tray. -Beautiful.

translation.de: Ja, aber wir machen noch Action Painting,

-I'll give it a shot. -[Christina] All right.

[Jon] Now go the other way?
-Am I going too-- -[Christina] You're good.
You pull it out from under me when I'm going too far. [Christina] There's no right or wrong way.
translation.de: -Zieh ihn weg, wenn ich zu weit gehe. -Es gibt kein Richtig oder Falsch.

translation.en: Do you want to add to this?
-This? -Chef?
-[Christina] He needs to… [laughs] -[Jon] That's the one--
You wanna cut into this sucker?
They taught me in school the most important part is tasting.
-Is tasting. -[Christina] Tasting.
-[Jon] Cuts easy, don't it? -[Christina] Mm-hmm.
We bake it. It poofs. And then…
I don't know about you, but I like a fudgy-in-the-center brownie.
translation.de: Ich mag Brownies, die innen weich sind. Ihr auch?

translation.en: -Yes. -You got it. I can feel it already.
[Christina] Nice.
-[Jon] That's really good. -That's a bake sale. They're so good.
Right? The textures are so great.
[Christina] Texture of the marshmallows on top, I just cannot get away from.
I'll go around and pick them off of every bite.
translation.de: Ich picke sie mir alle raus.

translation.en: [Jon] It's really good.
[Roy] Well, we solved the cookie and the brownie. Now, we got the cake.
translation.de: Cookie und Brownie sind erledigt. Jetzt kommt der Kuchen.

translation.en: You can't come to Milk Bar without making a layer cake.
translation.de: Eine Schichttorte ist Pflicht in der Milk Bar.

translation.en: -Yes. -[Roy] Layer cake.
-Few more steps than a cookie, but worth-- -However, I was thrown when I saw the mise
translation.de: -Etwas mehr Arbeit als beim Cookie... -Ich war verwirrt, als ich die Mise sah.

translation.en: because I've never seen that in a layer cake.
You're here, so why the heck not -roll out the red carpet? -Why not?
translation.de: -Für euch rolle ich den roten Teppich aus. -Klar.

translation.en: It's a recipe we've been working on for a few months
translation.de: Mit dem Rezept arbeiten wir seit ein paar Monaten,

translation.en: -since we came out with the birthday cake. -This is the chocolate birthday cake?
It's the chocolate birthday cake because not everyone is here for all the vanilla.
translation.de: Genau, weil nicht jeder wegen der ganzen Vanille herkommt.

translation.en: [Christina] Mixing cake is like mixing a cookie,
-in theory. -Right. -It starts with butter. Get it in there. -[Roy] Cream. Cream first.
translation.de: -Theoretisch. Zuerst die Butter rein. J -Cremig schlagen.

translation.en: [Christina] We're gonna add light brown sugar and granulated sugar.
translation.de: Wir geben hellbraunen Zucker und Kristallzucker dazu.

translation.en: And then ditto with the dark vanilla extract
because chocolate cake should be dark and rich.
translation.de: Und dann den dunklen Vanilleextrakt, weil Schokotorte dunkel und kräftig sein sollte.

translation.en: So we take a bunch of eggs, and we blend them down for our cakes.
translation.de: Wir verrühren für unsere Torten ein paar Eier.

translation.en: How do you know how many eggs you're adding?
We weigh them. A large egg is about 50 grams.
translation.de: Wir wiegen sie. Ein großes wiegt etwa 50 Gramm.

translation.en: -We try to pour the oil in first. -What's this on the bottom?
translation.de: -Das Öl sollte zuerst rein. -Was ist da unten?

translation.en: That's buttermilk. We layer our oil and our buttermilk.
translation.de: Buttermilch. Wir schichten Öl und Buttermilch.

translation.en: Oil is always the key to moist cake?
translation.de: -Öl macht Kuchen saftig? -Öl macht Kuchen saftig.

translation.en: -[Christina] Oil is the key to moist cake. -[Jon] Buttermilk, now you have your acid.
translation.de: -Öl macht Kuchen saftig? -Öl macht Kuchen saftig. Die Buttermilch sorgt für Säure und Fett.

translation.en: -You have your fat. -[Christina] Exactly.
translation.de: Die Buttermilch sorgt für Säure und Fett. Genau.

translation.en: [Jon] If it's not looking glossy, what do you add more of?
translation.de: Wenn es nicht so glänzt, was gibt man noch dazu?

translation.en: -You just keep-- -Blending?
You keep blending. Again, it's the most common mistake.
translation.de: Man rührt weiter. Das ist der häufigste Fehler.

translation.en: You don't want to change measurements because it's chemistry.
translation.de: -Keine Mengen ändern, weil das Chemie ist. -Nichts hinzufügen.

translation.en: -You don't just start-- -It's science.
translation.de: -Keine Mengen ändern, weil das Chemie ist. -Nichts hinzufügen. Wissenschaft.

translation.en: -[Jon] So all of your control-- -I'll just add a little bit more oil.
translation.de: -Deine ganze Kontrolle... -Nur ein bisschen mehr Öl.

translation.en: -No, but we do. -[Christina] Yeah.
That's what we do. So you're manipulating all of it
translation.de: Das machen wir. Also, du manipulierst alles...

translation.en: -through time and-- -And it's time and agitations.
That's where things go wrong. Remember when we were making the beignets?
translation.de: Deshalb ging es also schief. Bei den Beignets

translation.en: We were adding and changing the ratios a little bit.
translation.de: -haben wir was hinzugefügt... -Ja. -...und das Verhältnis leicht verändert. -Leicht.

translation.en: -[Roy] A little bit. -Yeah.
[groans] Du Monde?
Yeah, but it was three years old.
I think I have a three-year-old box of Café Du Monde. No, we got a fresh box, and we redid it.
translation.de: -Ich habe eine alte Box von Du Monde. -Ja. Wir machten sie mit einer neuen.

translation.en: [Christina] This is cake flour, baking powder, salt.
translation.de: Das ist glattes Mehl, Backpulver, Salz.

translation.en: [Jon] Now we wanna go--
-[Christina] As little as possible. -…short, high-speed short,
-or medium-speed short? -Medium-speed short.
We want to mix it for as little as humanly possible.
translation.de: Wir wollen so wenig wie möglich rühren.

translation.en: -[Jon] Now, probably stop it. -[Christina] You can stop it.
-Scrape it? -And my method is always you can finish
mixing anything and everything by hand.
translation.de: man kann alles manuell zu Ende rühren.

translation.en: [Jon] So it's folding more
-because you don't want to collapse it? -[Christina] Yeah.
I'm so proud. I could just retire. You could take my job for me. He's on it.
translation.de: Ich bin stolz. Ich kann in Rente gehen. Du kannst übernehmen. Er hat's drauf.

translation.en: I'm just here for show. He's doin' it all.
translation.de: Ich bin Staffage. Er macht alles.

translation.en: [Christina] So the batter goes in.
[Jon] Just do this?
[Christina] Yeah, exactly. You're spreading them in.
[Jon] I see.
-[Christina] Perfect. -[Jon] Okay.
[Christina] This side of the spatula is 90 degrees.
So rather than bring my spatula back, I get a little batter underneath it.
translation.de: Anstatt ihn zurückzuziehen, nehme ich darunter etwas Teig auf

translation.en: And then just wedge it into the corners.
translation.de: und schiebe ihn in die Ecken.

translation.en: There we go.
And then, for this guy, because, even though it's cake, we still love texture,
translation.de: Obwohl das hier eine Torte wird, wollen wir etwas Textur

translation.en: we just sprinkle some of our nice mini little chocolate chips.
translation.de: und verstreuen dafür einfach ein paar Mini-Schokochips.

translation.en: This is a very fancy cake batter, and that's well and good,
translation.de: Das hier ist zwar ein edler Kuchenteig,

translation.en: but, like, you can't take the girl out of the suburbs. A little bit.
translation.de: aber Vorortmädchen bleibt Vorortmädchen. Nur ein bisschen.

translation.en: And what's your go-to mini chip?
translation.de: -Welche Schokochips nimmst du? -Hauptsache, sie sind halbsüß.

translation.en: [Christina] Anything that's semi-sweet is nice. Milk chocolate is saved
translation.de: -Welche Schokochips nimmst du? -Hauptsache, sie sind halbsüß. Milchschokolade nur im Hershey's-Riegel,

translation.en: for my Hershey's candy bar,
-Reese's Peanut Butter Cup… Yeah. -For eating it directly.
[Christina] This goes in the oven 15, 20 minutes. [Jon] Okay.
-[Roy] All right. Cake? -[Christina] Chocolate cake.
A cake is done just as it starts to pull back from the edges.
translation.de: Kuchen ist fertig, wenn er sich von den Rändern löst.

translation.en: In order to start working with him,
-we just have to take him out of the pan. -[Jon] I see.
[Christina] They pop out, and this piece comes back really easily.
translation.de: Sie springen raus, und das hier löst sich leicht.

translation.en: -And you just smack them. -And just literally…yeah. Boom.
translation.de: -Man haut sie einfach rauf. -Und richtig... Ja. Bumm.

translation.en: [Jon] That was really fun. Okay.
-[Christina] You're a pro already. -[Jon] There we go.
Look at that.
[Christina] We know we need to cut it into rounds.
So why didn't you just make your first cakes into a rectangle?
translation.de: Warum hast du deine ersten Torten nicht rechteckig gemacht?

translation.en: That's a good question. Because this is nostalgia.
translation.de: Gute Frage. Weil das hier Nostalgie ist.

translation.en: A rectangle cake doesn't make sense,
-doesn't tug on my heartstrings. -Yeah. Okay. Yeah.
translation.de: -Rechteckige Torten ergeben keinen Sinn. -Ja. -Berührt mich nicht. -Ok.

translation.en: You don't need three great rounds to make a great cake. You only need one really great round.
translation.de: Man braucht keine drei schönen Kreise für eine tolle Torte. Einer reicht.

translation.en: -For the top. -[Christina] You…For the top.
That's one nice round.
Another as nice of a round as you can get.
[Jon, Christina] For the bottom.
[Christina] And then two almost--
-[Jon] Halves. -…half moons. Exactly.
And the chocolate chips, you gotta give them a little pounding.
translation.de: Und die Schokochips brauchen etwas Gewalt.

translation.en: So you get one full three-layer cake out of one flat?
translation.de: Eine ganze dreischichtige Torte aus einer Kuchenschicht?

translation.en: Out of one quarter-sheet pan, exactly.
[Jon] Roy, I'm getting into your area here.
translation.de: Roy, ich dringe bei dir ein.

translation.en: -Is that all right? -[Christina] Territory.
[Jon] We're gonna make this perfect now.
[Christina] Perfect. These rings are gonna be our new friends.
translation.de: Perfekt. Diese Ringe werden unsere neuen Freunde.

translation.en: -Give 'em a little dust down. -Like a plating cylinder?
There you go. Look at you. Did you learn that from Wolfgang?
translation.de: Super. Hast du das von Wolfgang gelernt?

translation.en: I learned it from Roy. Everything.
[Christina] Ring on cardboard becomes our new canvas.
translation.de: Ring auf Karton wird unsere neue Leinwand.

translation.en: -This stuff is acetate. -Yes.
-[Christina] So we use that as a guide. -[Jon] Okay.
-[Christina] We're gonna build from here. -[Jon] Mm-hmm.
[Christina] We're going to put our two--
-[Jon] Halves. -…half moons down first.
-[Jon] The sad round. -[Christina] The sad rounds! And then we're gonna use the one off scraps.
translation.de: -Die armseligen Kreise. -Genau. Dann benutzen wir die Reste.

translation.en: -[Jon] So spread it. -We'll break them down
translation.de: -Wir verteilen sie. -Wir füllen damit die Löcher.

translation.en: -to fill in the negative space. -[Jon] I see.
translation.de: -Wir verteilen sie. -Wir füllen damit die Löcher. Verstehe.

translation.en: [Christina] So this is a soak. It's a vanilla-scented soak.
It's the dreamy vanilla vibe, so it's a little bit of that clear vanilla extract.
translation.de: Wir sorgen mit klarem Vanilleextrakt für sinnliches Vanille-Aroma.

translation.en: You're putting about three spoonfuls of that soak down.
translation.de: Etwa drei Löffel von dieser Lauge kommen rein.

translation.en: [Jon] So moisture and flavor-- [Christina] Moisture and flavor are key here.
translation.de: -Feuchtigkeit und Aroma... -Feuchtigkeit und Aroma sind entscheidend.

translation.en: [Jon] What's this one?
[Christina] This is birthday frosting. This is our from-scratch version of it.
I put down usually three heaping spoonfuls.
translation.de: Davon kommen drei gehäufte Löffel rein.

translation.en: And you're gonna do the same figure-eight ellipses.
translation.de: Verteilt die mit genau den gleichen Achterellipsen.

translation.en: You just want to keep your spoon in the frosting.
translation.de: Behaltet den Löffel in der Glasur.

translation.en: Poking at it will pull the layer of cake up.
[Jon] Okay.
These are birthday crumbs. Spread 'em around.
And then, just to anchor them into the frosting.
translation.de: Drückt sie in die Glasur rein.

translation.en: [Roy] Okay.
So once crumb goes down--
-More frosting? -More frosting.
All right.
So we're gonna do the same thing all over. Cake, soak, frosting, crumb, frosting.
translation.de: Das Gleiche noch mal. Kuchen, Lauge, Glasur, Streusel, Glasur.

translation.en: I actually gotta go to a birthday party after this.
translation.de: Ich muss heute zu einer Geburtstagsparty.

translation.en: -No way. -This is perfect, yeah.
[Jon] I'll sell you mine.
-Yeah. -[all laugh]
Your favorite memory of birthday cake, do you have one?
translation.de: Woran denkt ihr am liebsten bei Geburtstagskuchen?

translation.en: -[Jon] Roy? -I like lemon cake, I would say.
The zing of it or the gooey pound-cake vibe?
translation.de: Weil er peppig ist, oder weil er ein Rührkuchen ist?

translation.en: Both. Koreans grow up with pound-cake-type cake.
translation.de: Beides. Koreaner wachsen mit Rührkuchen auf.

translation.en: -[Jon] Really? -Yeah.
My memories are the Entenmann's that everybody sneaks in at midnight
translation.de: Ich denke dabei an Entenmann's, von dem man nachts noch stibitzt.

translation.en: -to have more and disappears by morning. -But crumb cake? Like Entenmann's--
translation.de: Ich denke dabei an Entenmann's, von dem man nachts noch stibitzt. -Morgens ist er weg. -Streuselkuchen?

translation.en: Crumb cake's good. And whatever that cheesecake, -strudel-type thing… -[Christina] Oh, yeah.
[Jon] Uh-oh…No more frosting.
This is that anxiety that comes with doing this at home. [Christina] I know.
translation.de: -Diese Angst hat man zu Hause. -Ich weiß.

translation.en: See, now this really is like bake sale.
But this is right. This is the humanity of what happens in the kitchen.
translation.de: So soll es sein. -Das ist das Menschliche in der Küche. -Klecks in die Mitte. Zum Heulen.

translation.en: [Jon] I'm gonna put one dollop in the middle. I'd cry.
translation.de: -Das ist das Menschliche in der Küche. -Klecks in die Mitte. Zum Heulen.

translation.en: [Christina] Your friend would be like, "Hold on, I got…" [Jon] I have extra.
translation.de: -Nein, dein Freund hilft aus. -Ich habe was übrig.

translation.en: Now we're talking.
-There you go. -Gimme another layer.
[Christina] You're so… I know, right? Build it to the sky.
translation.de: Du bist so... Nicht wahr? Pack viel rauf.

translation.en: [Jon] Now I'm happy. Look at this.
translation.de: Jetzt bin ich glücklich. Guckt mal.

translation.en: [Christina] The best is, you can make the top as crazy as you want.
translation.de: Das Beste ist, oben kann man wild sein.

translation.en: -Once you pull the sides up-- -[Roy] That's pretty.
-[Christina] Yes! -[Jon] It's called Bart Simpson.
[Christina] Look at you! It means business.
translation.de: Schau an! Die ist richtig gut.

translation.en: [Jon] That's very pretty, Roy, I have to say. [Christina] He's got it.
translation.de: -Sehr hübsch, Roy. Ganz ehrlich. -Er hat's drauf.

translation.en: -We're going to the freezer, guys. -[Roy] In the freezer? Okay.
[Christina] We're gonna go in the Mr. Freeze deep freeze.
translation.de: Wir gehen in den Gefrierraum von Mr. Freeze.

translation.en: [Jon] This is the one where you get somebody to confess.
[Christina] Yeah! Yeah! Where did you put the milk?
translation.de: Ja! Wo hast du die Milch versteckt?

translation.en: Whenever I see this, I feel like I'm on Game of Thrones.
translation.de: Hier fühle ich mich wie bei Game of Thrones.

translation.en: -Yeah. -This one? Oh, the Wall.
[Roy] There we go.
-[Jon] Should we check on the cookies? -[Christina] Yeah, I'm ready.
[Christina] Gentlemen…
Feast your eyes. Look at those things.
-Excellent. -The marshmallows, you can see them popping out in a gooey way.
And you can tell, because there's no blowouts,
we mixed them all properly. You see the little jewels of it. It was perfectly scooped is what we can tell.
translation.de: -Richtig verrührt. Kleine Edelsteine. -Perfekt portioniert, wie man sieht.

translation.en: What I'm gauging here is that it's perfectly scooped, but for me that is…
translation.de: Sie sehen perfekt portioniert aus, aber für mich ist das...

translation.en: the moment of it.
[Jon] I like it so much more
translation.de: Ist besser, seit ich weiß, was drin ist.

translation.en: -now I know what's in it. -[Roy] It's delicious.
translation.de: Ist besser, seit ich weiß, was drin ist. Köstlich.

translation.en: [Christina] We crushed that.
All these cake scraps, we don't throw 'em away. We make 'em into cake truffles.
translation.de: Die Kuchenreste werfen wir nicht weg. Wir machen daraus Kuchentrüffel.

translation.en: They become the truffles? Okay. -[Christina] Yeah.
We put them all into a bowl.
translation.de: Wir geben sie alle in eine Schüssel.

translation.en: We break them down. And then we add that same cake soak.
translation.de: Wir zerbröseln sie, und dann kommt dieselbe Lauge dazu.

translation.en: And then you're gonna knead it almost as you would a bread dough.
translation.de: Und jetzt knetest du das wie Brotteig.

translation.en: Compress it. It's already baked, so you're not worried about
translation.de: Fester. Ist schon gebacken, also keine Sorge

translation.en: -developing gluten. -[Jon] Right.
[Christina] And from there, we use these scoops.
Fill 'em, compress 'em,
and we lay them out to the side there.
Roy, I'll scoop. You roll.
We sell so many of these puppies that, when we get down, like, we get down as a team.
translation.de: Wir verkaufen so viele davon, dass wir als ganzes Team daran arbeiten.

translation.en: You come. Someone's in charge of mixing.
Someone's in charge of scooping. Someone's in charge of rolling.
What's the best music for making these?
translation.de: Was ist die beste Musik dazu?

translation.en: [sighs] I think you need a very quick beat that's also a little screamy
translation.de: Ich finde, man braucht was Schnelles und Lautes,

translation.en: because it's like going to boot camp. It's like, "Go!" [screams]
translation.de: weil das wie ein Bootcamp ist. "Los!"

translation.en: -How many of these you go through? -Thousands of them.
On a week, we probably sell eight to ten thousand cake truffles.
translation.de: Pro Woche verkaufen wir -8000 bis 10.000 Kuchentrüffel. -Wirklich?

translation.en: So this is that birthday crumb with a little bit more chocolate.
translation.de: Das sind die Geburtstagsstreusel mit etwas mehr Schokolade.

translation.en: And we broke it down to a sandy.
This is white chocolate that is mixed with a little bit of oil
translation.de: Das ist weiße Schokolade mit etwas Öl gemischt.

translation.en: so that it's nice and thin.
[Christina] We're gonna white chocolate hands, -throw it over to Roy. -[Jon] Fried chicken.
translation.de: -Wir wälzen sie darin und geben sie Roy. -Paniertes Huhn.

translation.en: [Christina] Roy is going to rake it and then pull it.
translation.de: Roy bestreut sie und holt sie raus.

translation.en: -And then as soon as it sets… -[Jon] Warm.
…it's ready to eat or ready to package.
It's chocolate, vanilla, and a truffle.
So you can get some really primo bake-sale vibe.
Taste some of it.
The second this sets, there's a little of that shard of texture of white chocolate.
translation.de: Sobald alles fest ist, spürt man die Textur weißer Schokosplitter.

translation.en: -This one's gonna be a hit. -That one's gonna be a hit.
[Roy] So we have our bake sale now.
[Jon] You'd get that new library--
[Christina] In my imagination, this is what a bake sale should look like.
translation.de: -Neue Bibliothek für die Schule. -Perfekter Kuchenbasar. Ja.

translation.en: You show up to a bake sale with that, you got two secret weapons. All of a sudden, you're in a different realm.
translation.de: -Beim Kuchenbasar schlägt das voll ein. -Du betrittst eine neue Welt.

translation.en: -You're in a different territory. -[Roy] You're parent of the year.
[Jon] Lightning round. If I go to the ice cream parlor, I'll get vanilla.
translation.de: Blitzrunde. In der Eisdiele nehme ich Vanille.

translation.en: [Christina] I'm a vanilla-ice-cream person.
[Roy] For ice cream, vanilla milkshake, chocolate.
-[Jon] Really? -[Roy] The problem growing up is my mom
translation.de: Echt? Meine Mutter benutzte immer denselben Mixer wie für Kimchi.

translation.en: -used the same blender for kimchi. -[Jon] Acid. You want acid.
translation.de: Meine Mutter benutzte immer denselben Mixer wie für Kimchi. -Du willst Säure. -Ja.

translation.en: -[Christina] A little funk. -[all laugh]
translation.de: -Das war mein... -Funky. Untertitel von: Raik Westenberger
